title.rendered: RHINO AMAROK WINCH BAR – 4X4 EVOLUTION 3D FRONT BAR

content.rendered:
The new and exciting RHINO AMAROK WINCH BAR is available for order now.

The RHINO AMAROK WINCH BAR bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 snatch rated recovery points, great angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

The 3D Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in black Powder Coat. It is a 3mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in black and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

The VW Amarok 3D Evolution bumper has carried out dynamic crash testing here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Our standard VW Amarok front bar is designed for Amarok models with flared wheel arches, if you have a Core model Amarok with out flared guards please stipulate when ordering so the correct bar can be ordered.

Includes:

  • Standard with Winch mount
  • Integrated LED Fog lights
  • 5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate
  • 2 x Snatch rated vehicle recovery points
  • Front Parking Sensors – We can provide blanketing plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors.

Optional:

  • Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification
  • Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel
  • Shackles
  • Winch
  • Spotlight bar
  • Spotlights – check out our awesome lighting range here

Can be ordered to suit non-flared Amarok

RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION 3D FRONT WINCH BAR – VW AMAROK

Tough never looked so good

Check out our full range of Rhino Products. CLICK HERE.

excerpt.rendered:
THE RHINO4X4 EVOLUTION 3D FRONT WINCH BAR FOR VW AMAROK IS HERE!

NOW ALSO 100% COMPATIBLE WITH NEW V6 MODEL

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
